references: Related: CF 245902; Supersedes: Ord 80998; Amends: Ord 82011
summary: An ordinance relating to the release of motor vehicles impounded under Ordinance 82011 and amending Sections 3, 5 & 11 thereof, superseding Section 9 thereof and superseding Sections 111, 114 & 115 of the Traffic Code (Ordinance 80998).
